channel.title: Null spammer help!?!?!?!
channel.description: this guy on my server nulls it EVRYDAY and i cant get him to stop. i tried ipbanning him but he keeps using like diff ip things aftr like 1,2,3,4,5,6, and so on. plz help!!! he crashes my server for like 5hrs straight!!

item.title: Null spammer help!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @masseve1 masseve1
item.description:
@masseve1 wrote:

[quote=“lolcake_, post:7, topic:270204”]@op:

this is caused by your server accepting new connections that never send any data and end up letting it’s respective handling thread hang waiting for you to initiate the handshake and start to login, but they never do. you COULD have a timeout on time to wait for login, or you could more simply add a check to make sure each hostname or ip address has only one spawned connection with the server.[/quote] uhh is there a tut on tht?

Read full topic

item.title: Null spammer help!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

or you can find out how to ipban someone from your firewall

item.title: Null spammer help!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @lolcake lolcake_
item.description:
@lolcake wrote:

@op:

this is caused by your server accepting new connections that never send any data and end up letting it’s respective handling thread hang waiting for you to initiate the handshake and start to login, but they never do. you COULD have a timeout on time to wait for login, or you could more simply add a check to make sure each hostname or ip address has only one spawned connection with the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Null spammer help!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @masseve1 masseve1
item.description:
@masseve1 wrote:

[quote=“lolcake_, post:4, topic:270204”]by ‘nulling’ are you referring to your server terminal/console being flooded with exception stack traces and code saying ‘Client null disconnected’ or something along those lines? if so, restrict more than one connection from each hostname or ip address (your choice).[/quote]im talking about the client null disconnected thing like this where no one logs in or sutin.so its kinda not possible to do wat evry1 else says

Read full topic

item.title: Null spammer help!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @lolcake lolcake_
item.description:
@lolcake wrote:

by ‘nulling’ are you referring to your server terminal/console being flooded with exception stack traces and code saying ‘Client null disconnected’ or something along those lines? if so, restrict more than one connection from each hostname or ip address (your choice).

Read full topic
